skill.name: baoyu-article-illustrator
skill.description: Smart article illustration skill. Analyzes article content and generates illustrations at positions requiring visual aids with multiple style options. Use when user asks to "add illustrations to article", "generate images for article", or "illustrate article".
skill.summary: Smart article illustration skill. Analyzes article content and generates illustrations at positions ...
skill.author: JimLiu

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill with no executable code. All 60 static findings are false positives: the analyzer misidentified markdown syntax (code blocks, backticks, color codes) as security threats. SKILL.md and prompts/system.md contain only documentation and AI prompt templates.

content.value_statement: Articles with text alone fail to engage readers. This skill analyzes your article content and automatically generates contextual illustrations at key positions. Choose from 9 visual styles to match your content tone and topic.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes article content to identify illustration opportunities
Auto-selects visual style based on content signals (tech, warm, minimal, etc.)
Generates 9 distinct illustration styles with detailed color and element specifications
Creates illustration plan with position recommendations and purpose descriptions
Outputs prompts for image generation skills and inserts images into markdown
Handles sequential image generation with retry logic and progress tracking
limitations: Does not include image generation capability - requires separate image generation skill
Depends on external AI service for actual image creation
Output quality depends on the underlying image generation model
Limited to single article files - batch processing not supported

use_cases.title: Enhance blog posts
use_cases.description: Add professional illustrations to blog articles to increase engagement and visual appeal

use_cases.title: Scale visual content
use_cases.description: Generate consistent illustrations across multiple articles with brand-aligned styles

use_cases.title: Explain complex concepts
use_cases.description: Create diagrams and visual aids for technical documentation and tutorials

prompt_templates.title: Basic illustration
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate illustrations for my article at path/to/article.md using default auto-selected style

prompt_templates.title: Specific style
prompt_templates.prompt: Create tech-style illustrations for path/to/article.md with cyan and deep blue color scheme

prompt_templates.title: Custom approach
prompt_templates.prompt: Add illustrations to path/to/article.md using warm style with rounded shapes and friendly characters

prompt_templates.title: Detailed control
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze path/to/article.md and generate 5 illustrations in playful style with pastel rainbow colors and doodle elements

output_examples.input: Generate illustrations for my tech article about AI programming
output: Style: tech (auto-selected based on AI keywords)
Illustration positions: After introduction, After neural network section, After conclusion

output_examples.input: Illustrate my personal growth article with warm style
output: Elements: Rounded shapes, sun motifs, friendly characters

best_practices: Use auto-selection for natural content alignment, or specify style for intentional branding
Match illustration language to article language for consistent reader experience
Review generated images before publication - AI may misinterpret abstract concepts
anti_patterns: Do not use for sensitive figures without requesting cartoon alternatives
Avoid over-illustration - let text breathe with appropriate whitespace
Do not skip style review - mismatch between content and visual style reduces impact

faq.question: What image generation skills work with this skill?
faq.answer: Works with baoyu-gemini-web for Google-based image generation. Requires separate image skill installation.

faq.question: How many illustrations does it generate per article?
faq.answer: Generates at least 1 image per major section. Prioritizes core arguments and abstract concepts needing visualization.

faq.question: Can I use my own image prompts?
faq.answer: The skill creates prompt files in prompts/ directory. You can edit these before image generation if needed.

faq.question: What file formats does it support?
faq.answer: Accepts markdown files (.md). Outputs PNG images to imgs/ subdirectory alongside the article.

faq.question: How does it choose the illustration style?
faq.answer: Scans content for signals like AI/tech (tech style), personal stories (warm style), or simple concepts (minimal style). Default is notion.

faq.question: Can I customize colors within a style?
faq.answer: Styles have predefined color palettes. For custom colors, edit the generated prompt files before image generation.
